Reimagining Logistics with AI-Powered Automation

Managing logistics across manufacturing and transportation networks can be challenging â€” with fragmented systems, manual processes, and limited visibility slowing down operations. CargoPro is an AI-powered Transport Management System (TMS) designed to solve these problems at the core. From dispatch planning to delivery tracking, every step is optimized for speed, cost, and control.

Who are we?

CargoPro is TMS provider that delivers innovative freight and logistics management platforms that automate, track, and optimize end-to-end supply chain operations for businesses. Our comprehensive solutions tackle common business pain points like freight sourcing, indent management, complex finances, paper invoicing, and outdated tracking. CargoPro dashboard integrate planning, execution, settlement, and analysis to boost efficiency, visibility, and cost savings across transportation sourcing.

About Founder

Pranav Gupta

Founder

With a strong background in logistics and a deep passion for technology, he founded CargoPro to address the pressing challenges in the logistics industry. By combining technical expertise with a robust entrepreneurial spirit, he is driving change in an industry that has traditionally been fragmented and manual.
